price: សង្ឃឹមថាពួកយើងនឹងតាមគ្រូមន្ដអាគមទាំងនោះ ប្រសិន បើពួកគេគឺជាពួកដែលទទួលបានជ័យជំនះ។
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
